channel.title: Need help starting up my server
channel.description:
Yes im making a server and i need help
I've done everything apart from Port forward..
But now i'm stuck, I do have a router and it is conencted to my computer via ethernet, But... Nothing pops up nothing about "New hardware" or anything. If i can get this done my server will be done, Also i do know a router is used to connect to devices together, But i don't think you need two computers for Making a server.
This is my set up:
Router connects to the computer with ethernet, The computer connects to the phone line with a Phone cable (as i have dial up)
And, no disk came with the Router when i brought it.

item.title: Need help starting up my server
item.dc:creator: @Mitchishere Mitchishere
item.description:
@Mitchishere wrote:

Lol im not hosting it, my mates hosting it hes got broadband im just finding out how then im going to do it for him, Anyways thx alot!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help starting up my server

item.title: Need help starting up my server
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

You don’t need to port forward if the computer is connected to the modem directly / phone cable -> computer.
Also - you wont hold a lot of players maybe 5-6 no lag in best conditions when you aren’t doing anything other than hosting (ie, not opening sites / downloading etc)… (personal experience).

Read full topic
item.source: Need help starting up my server
